snippet.title: Cleared Hot - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Cleared Hot on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1710820/Cleared_Hot/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=exp1

Cleared Hot is a nostalgic helicopter shooter game with satisfying physics and light tactical elements. Shoot, dodge, move your squad around the battlefield, and pick up almost anything with your rope and magnet.
